amendment.description: To identify countries that are champions in the battle to combat global corruption, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 705 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 705 proposed by Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3719) To identify countries that are champions in the battle to combat global corruption, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 705 proposed by Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 705 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
